high_descs: turn right to face the dark brown desk
pick up the box of tissues on the desk
turn left and look up to face the green lamp
turn on the green lamp while holding the box of tissues
anns.task_desc: turn on the green lamp while holding a box of tissues

high_descs: Turn right towards the tissue box on the table.
Pick up the tissue box from the table.
Turn left towards the floor lamp in front of you.
anns.task_desc: Examine a tissue box by the light of a floor lamp.

high_descs: Turn to the right and face the tissue box from the table.
Pick up the tissue box on the table.
Head left and bring the box to the lamp.
Turn on the tall lamp on the floor.
anns.task_desc: Examine the tissue box by the light of the tall lamp on the floor.
